html:
Fury. Hebrew. chemah = heat, wrath, displeasure.

not in Me: i.e. not now. There was in the other song ( Isaiah 5:5-7): but now, "in that day" , all wrath will have gone.

briers and thorns: i.e. theinternal enemies of the vineyard (as the wild beasts are the external enemies). These are now the objects of His wrath, not His vineyard.
